about_the_game: Play the hardcore mode of this insane, innovative, addictive puzzler - if you dare! Inside each revealed hexagon is a number - that refers to how many of the adjacent tiles are the same colour. For example, a "6" would mean that every surrounding tile was the same colour as that hexagon. There is a wild twist: you can swap any two revealed tiles of different colors! This demo has endless replayability and gives a great taste of what Jubilane is all about.
detailed_description: Play the hardcore mode of this insane, innovative, addictive puzzler - if you dare! For example, a "6" would mean that every surrounding tile was the same colour as that hexagon. There is a wild twist: you can swap any two revealed tiles of different colors! This demo has endless replayability and gives a great taste of what Jubilane is all about.
name: Jubilane Demo

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 75 MB available space

short_description: Play the hardcore mode of this insane, innovative, addictive puzzler - if you dare! Count carefully - your next move WILL be your last!
